IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OFFERS ITS STUDENTS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OFFERS ITS STUDENTS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT THAT PREPARES THEM FOR LIFE, WORK AND SERVICE. GUIDED BY ITS CATHOLIC, MARIANIST AND LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATIONAL TRADITIONS, CHAMINADE ENCOURAGES THE (SEE SCHEDULE O) DEVELOPMENT OF MORAL CHARACTER AND PERSONAL COMPETENCIES, AND THE COMMITMENT TO BUILD A JUST AND PEACEFUL SOCIETY. THE UNIVERSITY OFFERS THE CIVIC AND CHURCH COMMUNITIES OF THE PACIFIC REGION ITS ACADEMIC AND INTELLECTUAL RESOURCES IN THE PURSUIT OF COMMON AIMS.
IRS990.Description: CHAMINADE OFFERS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT THAT PREPARES STUDENTS FOR LIFE, SERVICE AND SUCCESSFUL CAREERS. GUIDED BY ITS CATHOLIC, MARIANIST AND LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATIONAL TRADITIONS AND ACCREDITED BY THE WESTERN ASSOCIATION OF COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES, CHAMINADE PROVIDES 2800 STUDENTS WITH 23 UNDERGRADUATE DEGREE PROGRAMS, 8 GRADUATE DEGREE PROGRAMS AND SEVERAL DEGREE OPPORTUNITIES FOR WORKING ADULTS IN PROFESSIONAL AND CONTINUING EDUCATION (PACE).

Activity2.Description: AUXILIARY ENTERPRISES AT CHAMINADE INCLUDE A 400 STUDENT RESIDENCE HALL PROGRAM; DINING SERVICES FEATURING THE SILVERSWORD CAFE AND COURTYARD PATIO; NCAA PACIFIC WEST CONFERENCE DIVISION II ATHLETIC PROGRAM ANNUALLY HOSTING THE EA SPORTS MAUI INVITATIONAL BASKETBALL TOURNAMENT; CAMPUS BOOKSTORE; COPY CENTER AND MAIL SERVICES.

OtherLiabilities.Description: UNSECURED NOTES PAYABLE TO MARIANIST CENTER OF HAWAII

Form990ScheduleDPartXIII.Explanation: IN FYE JUNE 30, 2011, THE ORGANIZATION PURCHASED A FINE ART EDITION OF THE ST. JOHN'S BIBLE. THE BIBLE IS A WORK OF ART AND A WORK OF THEOLOGY. THE VISION AND VALUES OF THE BIBLE ARE TO IGNITE IMAGINATION, GLORIFY GOD'S WORD, REVIVE TRADITION, DISCOVER HISTORY, FOSTER THE ARTS, AND GIVE VOICE. THE ST. JOHN'S BIBLE, ON PUBLIC EXHIBITION, PROVIDES EDUCATION TO STUDENTS BY PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES TO EXPLORE THE VARIOUS SUBJECTS WRITTEN AND ILLUMINATED IN THE BIBLE. CHAMINADE PLANS TO USE THE BIBLE IN LITURGIES MARKING EVENTS OF GREATEST SIGNIFICANCE IN CAMPUS LIFE, SUCH AS GRADUATIONS AND INSTALLATIONS. CHAMINADE WILL ALSO MAKE IT AVAILABLE FOR USE BY THE DIOCESE OF HONOLULU FOR SIMILAR OCCASIONS, SUCH AS THE ANNUAL RED MASS FOR HAWAII'S POLITICAL LEADERS AND THE OPENING OF THE ACADEMIC YEAR MASS WITH THE CATHOLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIII.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIII.Explanation: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND PROGRAM EXPENSES.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIII.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS UNDER FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIII.Explanation: THE UNIVERSITY HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX POSITIONS AND DETERMINED THAT THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2013 AND 2012. INTEREST AND PENALTIES, IF ANY (NONE IN 2013 OR 2012), ARE INCLUDED IN INSTITUTIONAL SUPPORT EXPENSES. AS OF JUNE 30, 2013, THE YEARS THAT REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES ARE 2009 AND THEREAFTER.
CHANGE IN NET ASSETS OF CUEF 105,564. ROUNDING 1.
TUITION DISCOUNTS & SCHOLARSHIPS 9,423,424. FEDERAL GRANTS 4,052,121. RENTAL EXPENSES -50,752. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES -38,208. COGS -886,016.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 38,208. COGS 886,016. RENTAL EXPENSES 50,752. ROUNDING 1.
TUITION DISCOUNTS & SCHOLARSHIPS 9,423,424. FEDERAL GRANTS NETTED AGAINST REVENUE 4,052,121.

PART V, COLUMN (D): AMOUNTS WERE PREVIOUSLY ADJUSTED TO REFLECT REVISED FIGURES, AS REPORTED IN PRIOR YEAR AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMETS. AS SUCH, LINE 1G(E), FOUR YEARS BACK END OF YEAR BALANCE, WILL NOT TIE TO LINE 1A(D), THREE YEARS BACK BEGINNING OF YEAR BALANCE.

Form990ScheduleEPartII.Explanation: "NOTICE OF NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY" IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC VIA THE UNIVERSITY CATALOG, STUDENT HANDBOOK AND CHAMINADE WEBSITE (WWW.CHAMINADE.EDU)
THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES VARIOUS FEDERAL GOVERNMENT GRANTS SUCH AS THE PELL GRANT, TEACH GRANT, AND SUPPLEMENTAL EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITY GRANT.

AcctsActvsOutUSTable.SpecificServicesProvided: STUDENT PROGRAM, CONFERENCES, MONTESSORI, MEETINGS, RESEARCH & RECRUITING

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: THE SCHOOL PROVIDES GRANTS IN THE FORM OF CREDITS AGAINST TUITION INVOICES. GRANT FUNDS ARE NOT ACTUALLY DISBURSED FROM THE SCHOOL.

Form990ScheduleKPartVI.Explanation: ISSUER NAME: CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OF HONOLULU DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 02/28/2013

ENTITY OF WHICH A CURRENT DIRECTOR SERVED AS AN OFFICER OR DIRECTOR OF

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Identifier: METHOD FOR DETERMINING NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS:
Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: THE EXEMPT ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF ITEMS RECEIVED IN PART I, COLUMN (B). FOR PUBLICLY TRADED SECURITIES, EACH SEPARATE GIFT REPRESENTS AN ITEM.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990, PART V: QUESTIONS 7G AND 7H ARE NOT APPLICABLE TO THE EXEMPT ORGANIZATION. AS SUCH, THEY HAVE BEEN MARKED NO.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DANIEL J. CURRAN AND REV. JOHN A. MCGRATH: BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CHAMINADE'S MEMBERS CONSIST OF THE PROVINCIAL OF THE MARIANIST PROVINCE OF THE UNITED STATES AND THE OTHER MEMBERS OF THE PROVINCIAL COUNCIL OF THE MARIANIST PROVINCE OF THE UNITED STATES. THE MEMBERS HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO ELECT MEMBERS OF CHAMINADE'S GOVERNING BODY AND APPROVE SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY, AMONG OTHER SIMILAR POWERS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MEMBERS OF CHAMINADE HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO RATIFY NOMINEES FOR THE POSITION OF PRESIDENT OF CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OF HONOLULU AND TO RATIFY NOMINEES FOR THE BOARD OF REGENTS AT ANY ANNUAL OR SPECIAL MEETING OF MEMBERS NOTICED FOR THE ELECTION OF REGENTS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MEMBERS OF CHAMINADE HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO: (A) APPROVE THE MERGER OR CONSOLIDATION OF CHAMINADE WITH ANOTHER CORPORATION OR ENTITY; (B) APPROVE THE SALE, LEASE, EXCHANGE, OR OTHER DISPOSITION OF ALL, OR SUBSTANTIALLY ALL, OF THE ASSETS OF CHAMINADE, OTHER THAN IN THE USUAL AND REGULAR COURSE OF ITS BUSINESS; (C) APPROVE THE PARTIAL OR TOTAL DISSOLUTION OF CHAMINADE; (D) AMEND CHAMINADE'S ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION PURSUANT TO THE PROCEDERES SET FORTH BY STATUTE; (E) RATIFY NOMINEES FOR THE POSITION OF PRESIDENT OF CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OF HONOLULU; (F) RATIFY NOMINEES FOR THE BOARD OF REGENTS OF CHAMINADE AT ANY ANNUAL OR SPECIAL MEETING OF MEMBERS NOTICED FOR THE ELECTION OF REGENTS; AND (G) REMOVE A REGENT, WITH OR WITHOUT CAUSE, AT ANY ANNUAL OR SPECIAL MEETING OF THE MEMBERS NOTICED FOR THE REMOVAL OF THE REGENTS, PROVIDED, HOWEVER ANY VACANCIES MAY BE FILLED BY THE BOARD OF REGENTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BYLAWS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF THE 990 WILL BE SUBMITTED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AT THEIR APRIL 2014 MEETING FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FINALIZATION & FILING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH YEAR, IN JULY/AUGUST, THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE EMAILS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS TO EACH CURRENT MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF REGENTS. FORMS ARE THEN SENT BACK TO THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE, WHO REVIEWS THE COMPLETED FORMS AND TRACKS WHICH FORMS MAY STILL BE OUTSTANDING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S PRESIDENT, THE BOARD NEGOTIATES THE CONTRACT IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE UNIVERSITY LEGAL COUNSEL. FOR OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES, COMPENSATION IS NEGOTIATED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNIVERSITY WHO CONSULTS WITH THE PERSONNEL OFFICE & COMPARES COMPENSATION WITH PEER INSTITUTIONS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS & CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE & UPON REQUEST.
FORM 990, PART VII: MICHAEL DOHM, EX-OFFICIO, IS COMPENSATED AS A FACULTY MEMBER AND NOT AS A BOARD MEMBER.

DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2012, CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY ENTERED INTO A LONG-TERM POWER PURCHASE AGREEMENT TO PURCHASE THE ENERGY GENERATED BY A SOLAR ELECTRIC GENERATING FACILITY. MANAGEMENT HAS RECOGNIZED A CAPITAL LEASE FOR THE ESTIMATED PAYMENTS RELATED TO THE SYSTEM. ALTHOUGH FOR TAX PURPOSES THE AGREEMENT WOULD NOT FALL UNDER THE DEFINITION OF A CAPITAL LEASE, THE POWER PURCHASE AGREEMENT WILL BE ACCOUNTED FOR AS A CAPITAL LEASE ON THE FORM 990 IN KEEPING WITH THE BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CHANGE IN NET ASSETS OF CUEF: 105,564.
FORM 990, PART XII, LINE 2C: THE OVERSIGHT AND SELECTION PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
